text:
Martin Bundi (19 October 1932 – 1 January 2020) was a Swiss historian and politician. He was a longtime member of the Social Democratic Party. He was a member of the member of the National Council from 1975 to 1995. He was also the National Council's president from 1985 to 1986.
Bundi was born in Sagogn. He was married with five children. He died on 1 January 2020 in Chur at the age of 87.
